document_data.name: Malabeth Tr'rudena
document_data.mainbody: '''Malabeth Tr'rudena''' was a [[drow]] [[cleric|priestess]] and a member of the [[She-Spider Cult]].
document_data.Description: Malabeth wore a metallic bikini and a white loincloth, and accessorized with various chains and white feathers. She had pure black skin and white hair.
document_data.Possessions: She owned a pair of ''[[bracers of defense]]'', as well as a ''[[necklace of prayer beads]]'' and twin ''[[dagger of venom|daggers of venom]]''.
document_data.Activites: Although she was a member of the She-Spider Cult, an organization forsaken by both [[Lolth]] and [[Shar]], Malabeth still retained her divine powers. As a result, it was suspected that she was a spy for Lolth.
